alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 2:51PM MST until July 25 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Arizona and west central Arizona, including the following counties, in north central Arizona, Coconino. In west central Arizona, Yavapai. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 250 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms between Seligman and Fraziers Well. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Seligman, Rose Well and Hualapai Reservation. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
